approach: Tour operators of our company can develop and organize tours for you in any region of Uzbekistan, providing both a comprehensive and separate service on a free basis.
bookinCategory: Booking and accommodation in hotels of any category;
bookRailway: Booking and redemption of w/d tickets for electric trains inside Uzbekistan;
bookTickets: Booking and purchase of tickets for domestic and international flights;
customTour: We are ready to create for you individual tours of historical cities, if in the preliminary application will be specified:
etc: Rental of premises for conferences, seminars, round tables, etc.;
exp: We are a tour operator (out coming/incoming) in the field of international tourism 8 years. The team brings together real professionals - multilingual professionals of the tourism business, providing an exceptionally high level of service.
food: Food - European cuisine and Uzbek national;
licence: License for tour operator activity T-0042-08 of the State Committee for Tourism Development. Welcome to Uzbekistan!
numDays: Desired number of days of stay on the route;
org: Organization of additional services that are not part of the core service programme;
orgMeets: Organization of meetings with specialists in various fields of the economy of Uzbekistan.
sivices: List of tourist services offered to the customer:
soop: Support of guide-translators along the route;
time: Convenient for you time of year;
touristAuto: Tourist vehicles of any category and capacity;
trnasport: Our company can warn you any kind of vehicle for you.
